law.catch_line: Fund to support education excellence in Kentucky.

text.section: There is hereby established the fund to support education excellence in Kentucky consisting of appropriations for distribution to districts in accordance with the provisions of KRS 157.310 to 157.440.
The resources of the public school fund shall be paid into the State Treasury, and shall be drawn out or appropriated only in aid of public schools as provided by statute.

law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. III, sec. 95, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 23, effective July 1, 1976.

metadata.former-history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 18, effective June 30, 1976. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 3.
metadata.lrc-note: . Former KRS 157.330 (Enact. Acts 1954, ch. 214, Â§ 3; 1956, ch. 106, Â§ 1) was repealed by Acts 1974, ch. 363, Â§ 18, effective June 30, 1976.
